name: The 25th Ward: The Silver Case / シルバー事件２５区
description: In the bayside area of Kanto, a murder with unknown motivations sets off a series of seemingly random events bringing together peculiar individuals, one of whom is detective Tokio Morishima.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Onboard DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
